# projectedValue

**Instance Property**

The property for which this instance exposes a publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
var projectedValue: Published<Value>.Publisher { mutating get set }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Published/projectedValue] is the property accessed with the `$` operator.

## Publishing the value

- **Published.Publisher**: A publisher for properties marked with the `@Published` attribute.
